field.label: Enabled
field.help: Enables the DHCP AdGuard Sync service

field.label: Adguard Home URL
field.help: URL to your Adguard Home instance - if running the OPNsense plugin this is probably http://localhost:3000

field.label: DHCP Server
field.help: Select the DHCP server type to sync with. This will inform the application where to find the lease file on disk so that it can read and update the current leases.
